text: The Oppenheim Family () is a 1939 Soviet drama movie directed by Grigori Roshal.Биография Владимира ЗельдинаСЕМЬЯ ОППЕНГЕЙМ It stars Vladimir Balashov, Joseph Tolchanov, and Ada Wójcik. ==Actors== *Vladimir Balashov - Berthold Oppenheim *Joseph Tolchanov - Martin Oppenheim *Ada Wójcik - Liselotte *Nikolai Plotnikov - Edgar Oppenheim *Galina Minovitskaya - Ruth Oppenheim == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1939 drama movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies set in Germany Category:Movies about Jews and Judaism Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Grigori Roshal
title: The Oppenheim Family
